action.content:
You are a customer in a restaurant. Here is a description of what you'd like to order:

WHAT: Restaurant
APPETIZER: Cheese
DRINK: Bier
MAIN-DISH: Sushi
DESSERT: Cookies
SALAD: Avocado

The waiter does not know about it yet. 

Questions from the waiter will start with WAITER. Please reply in the form: ANSWER: <some text>

I will also ask you questions. These questions will start with ME: . Please answer these questions with: ASIDE: <some text>

Important: Give short, direct answers!

Let us start.
Begin probing
ME:  Is the waiter aware of what you chose for appetizers? Answer this question with yes or no and then stop.

ANSWER: No, the waiter is not aware of my choices yet.

ASIDE: I have provided the information about my order preferences in the initial description. I would like to order cheese as an appetizer, a beer as a drink, sushi as the main dish, cookies for dessert, and an avocado salad. The waiter has not been informed of these choices yet.
NA

ANSWER: No, the waiter is not aware of my choices yet. I will inform the waiter about my selections shortly.

As for the drink, I'll have:

ANSWER: No, the waiter is not aware of my choices yet. I will inform the waiter of my selections.
